arStrings.szText: While using this weapon, damaging at least one enemy with {c_important}Rupture{/c} creates a blood pool that inflicts {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Bleeding damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. Enemies standing in the pool take {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased Bleeding damage.
